description: Describes a particular moment in the video when event(s) occurred. This may not be aligned with exactly when a video frame occurred (e.g., it could be _in between_ video frames).

ball.description: Describes where the ball is and what, if anything, is happening to it. Omitted if we don't know where the ball is.

confidence.description: the confidence we have in this ball data
confidence.title: Prediction Confidence

contact.description:
Describes what the ball is in contact with.
* `air` - the ball is flying through the air
* `ground` - the ball is bouncing on the ground
* `net` - the ball is touching the net
* `paddle` - the ball is touching a player's paddle

position.description: a position in feet relative to the far left court corner
position.title: World XYZ

shot.description: Describes a ball hit by a player's paddle.
shot.title: Shot

zone.description:
Describes the place something is in:
* deep - in the deep zone (between 39 and 44 feet deep in the court)
* mid - in the mid zone (between 34 and 39 feet deep in the court)
* short - in the short zone (between 29 and 34 feet deep in the court)
* kitchen - in the kitchen zone (between 22 and 29 feet deep in the court)
* net - on the net
* out - out of bounds
zone.title: Zone

kitchen_changes.description:
Reports which players (if any) arrived or departed from the kitchen at this time.

* The key is /types/player_id.
* The value is one of `"arrived"` or `"departed"`. Players which neither
arrived nor departed at this time are omitted.

^0|1|2|3$.description: indicates whether a player arrived at or left the kitchen line
^0|1|2|3$.title: Kitchen Change Type

ms.description: when in the video this moment occurred (in milliseconds)

player_positions.description: each player's position on the court

items.description: a position in feet relative to the far left court corner
items.title: World XY

title: Moment
